Title: Blind Them!
Description:
These sunwalkers are a tiresome lot. I need soldiers with horde blood in their veins and honor in their hearts. Not some pacifist sun spirit filth.

The Alliance are here, $p. Followed us no doubt, or somehow tracked the same visions Leza had that led us here. It doesn't matter. I don't want them to know how divided we are at the moment. Go kill their scout south of here before it can report back.

Hellscream's eyes upon you.
